GeneDef.label: ocular affinity
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a special connection to the ocular trees, allowing them to act as an amplifier to the special properties of the tree. They can swiftly prune the tree and increase the success chance of any tree-related rituals. Most importantly, carriers of this gene act as an extension of the gauranlen ecosystem, and can spawn and command two dryads wherever they go.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Guarantees Natural Meditation focus on the pawn.
